ourStory.title: More Than an Agency, We're Your Growth Partner.

story.paragraph1: Idrissi Affairs was born in Kenitra from a simple observation: entrepreneurs waste too much time, energy, and money running between separate accountants, web developers, and consultants. The process was fragmented, inefficient, and often led to misaligned strategies.
story.paragraph2: We saw a clear need for a unified, integrated approach. Our mission became to provide ambitious entrepreneurs with a single, trusted partner to guide them from the very spark of an idea to a thriving, successful, and globally-connected enterprise.
story.paragraph3: We are more than just service providers; we are co-architects of your vision. We believe in building lasting relationships, offering strategic guidance that transcends simple transactions. Your success is our success, and we are committed to being by your side every step of the way.

moulayMounir.name: Moulay Mounir Moussaid El Idrissi
moulayMounir.description: As the Founder and CEO, Moulay Mounir is the visionary leader at the heart of our firm. He established the practice with a mission to deliver exceptional financial expertise and build a legacy of client success. His leadership is the driving force behind our firm's strategy, culture, and commitment to excellence. He continues to provide hands-on, expert counsel on our most complex cases, ensuring our founding principles of integrity and superior service are upheld in every engagement.

anas.name: Anas Moussaid El Idrissi
anas.description: Anas leads our digital innovation and technical infrastructure. He oversees the development of our proprietary and client-facing technology solutions, ensuring robust performance and security. His team provides critical technical support and is dedicated to solving challenges with cutting-edge technology.

hajarBouamira.name: Hajar Bouamira
hajarBouamira.description: Hajar serves as the primary interface between our firm and external judicial and administrative bodies. She is an expert in navigating complex procedural requirements and represents our clients' interests on the ground, managing all matters that require a physical presence with precision and professionalism.

hajarErahmani.name: Hajar Erahmani
hajarErahmani.description: Hajar is the backbone of our firm's internal operations. She manages all aspects of financial administration, including accounting and VAT compliance. Her role is critical in coordinating client schedules and optimizing our operational workflow to ensure exceptional service delivery.
